etymology.description: Two 人(人) (rén, "person"), one upright (亻) and one upside down (𠤎) -> reversal or change

examples.chinese: 他是勇敢的𠤎(他是勇敢的𠤎)。
这个𠤎勤奋好学(這個𠤎勤奮好學)，为家人争光(為家人爭光)。
examples.pinyin: Zhège rén qínfèn hàoxué, wèi jiārén zhēngguāng.
examples.english: This person is diligent and studious, bringing honor to his family.

examples.chinese: 老𠤎智慧丰富(老𠤎智慧豐富)。
examples.english: The elderly person is wise and knowledgeable.
